tech.mcprison.prison.store

Interface Storage


  • public interface Storage
    Access the storage API.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createDatabase(java.lang.String name)
      Create a new database.
      void deleteDatabase(java.lang.String name)
      Deletes a database.
      java.util.Optional<Database> getDatabase(java.lang.String name)
      Attempts to retrieve a database from the storage system.
      java.util.List<Database> getDatabases() 
      boolean isConnected() 

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true if the storage backend is up and running, and false if something went wrong. If this is false, it is probably not safe to attempt to read/write data.

      • getDatabase

        java.util.Optional<Database> getDatabase(java.lang.String name)
        Attempts to retrieve a database from the storage system.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the database to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An optional containing the database if it was found, or an empty optional if it doesn't exist.

      • createDatabase

        void createDatabase(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new database. If a database exists by the provided name, this method will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new database.

      • deleteDatabase

        void deleteDatabase(java.lang.String name)
        Deletes a database. If no database exists by the provided nmae, this method will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the database to delete.

      • getDatabases

        java.util.List<Database> getDatabases()
        Returns:
        A list of all databases in the storage system.
